exec: tests["Basket is created at test vendor"] = responseCode.code == '200';
tests["Basket is created at test vendor"] = responseCode.code == '200';
tests["Basket response body matches schema"] = tv4.validate(data, basketSchema);

item.name: Add Batch Product To Basket By Chain Id
Add Single Product To Basket By Chain Id

exec: tests["Advance order fails validation when pickup time is unspecified"] = responseBody.has("Please specify the time you'd like this order to be ready");

item.name: Submit Manual Fire Order by External Reference
Check User Open Manual Fire Orders
Start Forgot Password Process for Olo User
Get Restaurants Delivering To Lat / Lng

body.raw:
{
    "handoffmode": "delivery",
    "timewantedmode": "asap",
    "street": "Oslo, the capital of Norway, sits on the countrys southern coast at the head of the Oslofjord. Its known for its green spaces and museums. Many of these are on the Bygdy Peninsula, including the waterside Norwegian Maritime Museum and the Viking Ship Museum, with Viking ships from the 9th century. The Holmenkollbakken is a ski-jumping hill with panoramic views of the fjord. It also has a ski museum",
    "city": "Oslo, the capital of Norway, sits on the countrys southern coast at the head of the Oslofjord. Its known for its green spaces and museums. Many of these are on the Bygdy Peninsula, including the waterside Norwegian Maritime Museum and the Viking Ship Museum, with Viking ships from the 9th century. The Holmenkollbakken is a ski-jumping hill with panoramic views of the fjord. It also has a ski museum",
    "zipcode": "19130"
}
